member_organisations: The full list of EFSI's members can be found here : http://www.efsi-europe.eu/about-us/members/
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives:
-Implementation of the European Pillar of Social Rights and related initiatives 
-Review of the Europe 2020 Strategy 
-Work of the European Platform on undeclared work 
-European Commission's initiatives related to work-life balance. 
-European Commission annual work programme 
-European Fund for Strategic Investment. 
-All initiatives related to personal and household services (PHS).
organisation_name: European Federation for Services to Individuals (EFSI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
EFSI is the representative body for national federations and companies that are involved in the development of personal and household services in Europe. Its role is to represent the industry and promote the development of the sector across Europe. 
 
EFSI brings national federations and associations as well as private companies together. Through its members, EFSI is present in 22 EU members states.
relevant_communication:
During the year 2016, EFSI has been actively involved in the closing and the dissemination of the results of two European projects funded by PROGRESS :  
- IMPact (Improving Measurement of Public support to PHS) 
- 4Quality (http://forquality.eu/). 
Furthermore, it organised in partnership with the CCMI of the EESC the 7th European Conference on personal and household services. 
in the course of 2017, EFSI worked at the dissemination of the results of the IMPact project, especially at national level. It also launched a reflection process on innovation in the PHS sector.
